01 办学使命
School Mission
苏国外希雅国际学校旨在博采中西方教育理念 源自姑苏 的精粹，培养美好生活的领创者；成为内蕴卓越中 国基因的IB学校（全球代码：003908）；立志为中
跨世纪卓越学校 国国际教育做出卓越贡献。苏国外创办于1995年， 畔阳澄湖，隶属于启迪教育集团，从幼儿园到高中 A Cross-Century School of 十五年一贯制，是华东地区历史最悠久的著名国际 化学校之一。 Excellence from Suzhou Suzhou Innovation Academy Suzhou Innovation Academy aims to draw on the quintessence of Chinese and Western educational concepts to cultivate leaders of a prosperous life, and to become an IB world school. Suzhou Innovation Academy(Global code: 003908) is a highly ranked IB diploma school dedicated to cultivating talents in this fast- changing, dynamic century. Suzhou International Foreign Language School was founded in 1995 in Suzhou, located by Yangcheng Lake. It is affiliated to SIFLS Qidi Education Group. SIFLS is one of the most famous and oldest international schools in East China and is the first nationally renowned K-12 private school in Suzhou..

苏国外希雅国际学校
苏国外希雅国际学校以极高质量的两年制国际文凭组织大学预科课程(IBDP)和一年制预备课程（FP），为 学生提供多元文化环境和创新、挑战的教育体验。 我们致力于培养学生杰出的学术能力，坚韧的成长心态和卓越的创新精神，以进入全球Top30名校为开 端，成为具有强烈的责任感和使命感的世界公民。 Suzhou Innovation Academy offers the internationally renowned 2-year IB Diploma Program (IBDP) and a one-year Foundation Program(FP). Students will receive an exciting and challenging multicultural education at SIA. Starting from entering the top 30 universities in the world, SIA graduates will become excellent global citizens with outstanding Chinese genes because of their outstanding knowledge, perseverance, and unswerving enthusiasm for learning.

02
中国基因
领创美好生活
An International Education Built on a Chinese Foundation
“立志、立行、立业” 和 “兼济天下”
Chinese-nurtured Talents to Lead a Better life
源远流长、博大精深的中国文化和精神对教育的影响上溯两千多年。在希雅，学习扎根于中国基因，放眼于 世界未来，学生胸怀 “立志、立行、立业”和“兼济天下”的信念。身体力行价值追求，爱国敬业、孝亲尊师、 重友优学、开拓未来。在青少年成长最关键的时期形成自己的独立人格，是受益终生的宝贵经历。希雅学生将满 怀自信走向世界，在多元文化中游刃有余，又能回归祖国大展宏图。
The influence of the long-standing and profound Chinese culture and spirit on education dates back more than two thousand years. In the international school of SIA, learning is rooted in Chinese foundation and looks to the future of the world. Students have the beliefs of " to build doctrine, to sign virtue, to set profession and contributing to the world , practice the moral principles of "benevolence, righteousness, propriety, wisdom, and trustworthiness , love the motherland, respect for teachers. Helping students form their own personalities during the most critical period of time and gain valuable experience that will benefit them throughout their lives. SIA students will go into the world with confidence, be able to handle multiple cultures with ease, and return to the motherland to make great achievements.

希雅将中国历史、政治和文化等国学课程贯穿在各年级IB课纲中，开设“致良知”卓越中国文化课程和国际 理解课程。在全球化视角下培养学生对中国文化的热爱和对中国身份的认同。在希雅，无论是学习和生活社区， 通过丰富多彩的社团活动和服务项目，同学们将尊重他人，严谨求学，和而不同，内化为行动力，在多变的世界 里怀抱良知与勇气。
SIA integrates Chinese history, politics, and culture and other national courses into the IB curriculum of each grade, integrates virtue and festival education into students' daily activities, and cultivates students' passion for Chinese culture and recognition of Chinese identity from a global perspective. Whether it is in the study and living community of SIA boarding school or through a variety of club activities and service projects, students can study rigorously, know how to care for others, understand harmony in diversity, and strive to do things without arguing. Embracing conscience and courage in a changing world.

学生可以在六大学科组丰富的课程中进行个性化、定制化的选择，在拓宽知识面的同时，更能充分 发挥自身学科特长，为申请藤校、牛津剑桥及全球TOP30名校打下坚实的学术基础。 所有开设的学科，学生可以自由选择学习难度。学生可以根据不同的学科优势，自主选择标阶或高 阶的课程学习，这也是IB课程的独到之处。 通过本地或全球性话题，学生能够进行跨学科学习，将学习内容与周围的世界关联起来。
Students can make individualized and custom choices from the rich depth of courses in the six discipline groups. While broadening their knowledge, they can truly develop their own discipline expertise and lay an academic foundation for applying to Ivy League schools, Oxbridge, and the world's top 30 universities. A unique facet of IB is that for all subjects offered, students can freely choose either standard-level or higher- level courses according to their own abilities. Through studying local and global topics, students work across a number of disciplines, making connections between what they learn and the world around them.

除学科领域外，学生还将钻研IB文凭课程的三大核心课程，即知识论、扩展性论文以及创 造力、行动力和服务项目。 Apart from the mentioned subject areas, students will delve into another three core subjects of the IB Diploma, namely Theory of Knowledge, Extended Essay and Projects of Creativity, Activity and Service.
知识论要求学生深入了解知识本身。这是一门哲学学科，旨在让学生提出问题， 知识论 深入了解知识的构成方式以及对个人和文化方面的知识偏见进行批判性思维。 TOK Theory of Knowledge gets students to look deeply into knowledge itself. It is a philosophical subject designed for students to ask questions, look deeply at how knowledge is constructed, and think critically about biases in knowledge both personally and culturally.
拓展论文可以被视为微型论文，在此类论文中，学生可以探索其学科组内感兴趣 扩展论文 的领域。EE使学生能够进一步提高研究技能，并在与导师进行的一系列谈话中反 EE 思自己的主题。 The extended essay can be considered a mini-thesis in which the student explores an area of interest within their subject groups, or as an interdisciplinary inquiry across two study areas of global significance. This essay enables students to further their research skills as well as reflect on their topic during a series of interviews with a supervisor.
专为IB文凭课程学生的个人发展而设计。通过一个自我指导的项目，学生必须在 创造、行动、服务 与创意、体育活动和志愿活动交织的体验之旅中使用问题解决技能、沟通和决策 CAS 能力。 CAS is specifically designed for the personal development of IB Diploma students. Through a self-guided project, students must use problem-solving techniques, communication and decision-making skills in an experiential journey interweaving with creativity, physical activity, and volunteering.
